goal.en: To increase the abilities of oral presentation and self-learning of graduate students
goal.ch: 培養研究生進行文獻回顧及專業簡報能力

content.en:
"1. Presentation
2. Abstract
3. Report file (Powerpoint file)
4. Q & A report (Word file)"
content.ch: 研究生至少專題報告乙次，繳交簡報摘要、簡報檔案以及問答報告

grading.ch: "參與研討 20% 專題報告 50% 書面報告 30%"

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)
